0.speaker: sol
0.text: Do you know where we are?

0.speaker: jack
0.text: Well by the looks of it, we're in the middle of some kinda cursed jungle with no hope of escape

0.speaker: sol
0.text: S-Stop trying to scare me, Jack!

0.speaker: jack
0.text: Heh heh! Don't get your diaper in a twist, kid. There's probably a way out. Maybe.

0.speaker: jack
0.text: Well let's hurry and find a way outta here before you get so old you need 'em again!
Jack is pushing on the block with all his might. He looks like he could use a little help.

0.speaker: sol
0.text: I think this block could be pushed out of the way!

0.speaker: jack
0.text: Alright now we're gettin' somewhere! Get a move on and push it, kid!

1.speaker: sol
1.text: It's no use... It must weigh, like, a thousand pounds.

1.speaker: jack
1.text: Aw c'mon! Don't tell me you're too wimpy to push a little rock a few inches?

1.speaker: sol
1.text: You know, this would be a lot easier if you would just help me out a little...

1.speaker: jack
1.text: Pffft! I could probably lift that block myself with THESE muscles! Step aside kiddo.

2.speaker: sol
2.text: I think it's more like WE did it...

2.speaker: jack
2.text: Whatever! Now how do we get outta this dump?

0.text: It's a button! Looks like you and Jack are too light to press it.

1.speaker: jack
1.text: Hey look! The vines opened up when we pressed the button!

1.speaker: sol
1.text: What kind of forest has buttons that can control vines?!

1.speaker: jack
1.text: Eh, don't think about it too hard, kid. We gotta get back before lunch or I'm gonna flip my lid!

0.text: You see a glimmer of light through the branches, but the way is blocked by thorny vines. Wouldn't want to go in there.

0.speaker: shadow
0.text: Hmm? Someone moved my block. I finally had this place... organized...
